messages.message: While using Converse for a company's 10Q, I noticed that many of my questions came back with no results when using the company's full name (ie Williams Sonoma here) whereas using "the company" or the ticker "WSM" provided more results. Interestingly, when I used the ticker the tool responded with the full name of the company anyways. A few examples below:

Yes, there is high sensitivity of results from LLMs to specific wording of prompts.

Hence, we added a guide to write better prompts inside Converse, right below the chat box. It links to this document - https://instabase.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/AI-Hub-Converse-Best-Practices-2023-06-06.pdf

Please check and let us know if you find it useful. We are also going to revise this continuously to help the users, and move this document to docs instead of an external pdf.
